concise_definition: n. 电线, 金属丝, 电报; v. 发电报, 用线连接

definitions.explanation_en: Thin strands or rods of metal, typically copper or aluminum, used to conduct electricity or transmit signals in electrical and electronic systems.
definitions.explanation_cn: 由铜或铝等金属制成的细丝或细杆，用于在电气和电子系统中传导电流或传输信号。
definitions.example_en: The electrician replaced the old wires in the house to prevent overheating.
definitions.example_cn: 电工更换了房子里的老电线，以防止过热。

definitions.explanation_en: A system of electrical conductors connecting components in a device, such as the internal wiring of a computer or appliance.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指设备中连接各个部件的导体系统，例如计算机或家用电器的内部线路。
definitions.example_en: There was a short circuit in the wiring of the toaster.
definitions.example_cn: 烤面包机的线路发生了短路。

definitions.explanation_en: A message sent by telegraph or, informally, by telephone or electronic means; often used in the phrase 'to send wires'.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指通过电报发送的信息，或非正式地指通过电话或电子方式发送的消息；常用于短语 'send wires'。
definitions.example_en: She received wires from her family urging her to come home.
definitions.example_cn: 她收到了家人发来的电报，催她回家。

definitions.explanation_en: To send a message, especially by telegraph or electronically, often implying urgency or formality.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指发送信息，尤指通过电报或电子方式，常暗示紧急性或正式性。
definitions.example_en: He wired the headquarters to confirm the meeting time.
definitions.example_cn: 他发电报给总部确认会议时间。

definitions.explanation_en: To connect or install electrical wires in or to something, especially during construction or repair.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指在建筑或维修过程中，将电线连接或安装到某物上。
definitions.example_en: The contractor wired the new apartment with modern circuitry.
definitions.example_cn: 承包商为这套新公寓安装了现代电路。

comparison.analysis: “Cables”（电缆）通常指由多根绝缘导线组成的较粗、较坚固的线束，用于传输电力或数据，常用于长距离或高负载场景，如海底电缆或网络主干。而 “wires” 更泛指单根或少量导体，更轻便、常用于内部连接或低功率场景。
“Threads”（线、纱线）通常指纺织用的细纤维，如棉线或缝纫线，用于缝合或编织，不具备导电性。而 “wires” 是金属导体，专用于导电或传输信号，两者在材料和功能上完全不同。
“Lines”（线路）是一个更宽泛的术语，可指任何类型的线状结构，如电话线、铁路线、水管道或抽象的“界限”。而 “wires” 特指金属导体，强调其电气功能。在电力语境中，“wires” 是 “lines” 的一种具体形式。
